title: Craik and Tulving improve recall of word umbrella

content.question: According to research on levels of processing, which of the following would most improve the ability to recall the word “umbrella”?

choices.label: Counting the number of syllables in the word “umbrella”
Deciding whether an umbrella would be useful to pack for a trip
Deciding whether the word “umbrella” rhymes with the word “banana”

content.answer: Deciding whether an umbrella would be useful to pack for a trip

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
